On Tuesday 11 March 2003 10:02, mangeshminal wrote:
>   Implementation can be treated as contract which needs to be
> fulfilled by the classes.

So you want to make sure derived classes and classes implementing 
interfaces honor the base class' (or the interfaces') contract?

To check this I would make an abstract TestXyz class implementing Test 
and derive the Test cases for concrete classes from that class. The 
TextXyz class tests the common parts of the contract.

Robert
